main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.node

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.node.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents one node in the network. The node holds a array of minimum length 8-bytes and all operations are performed directly on this array.

      • Node

        public Node(byte[] name,
            byte[] host,
            char port)
        Creates a new node from a name, a host, and a port
        Parameters:
        name - name of the group represented by a byte array
        host - domain of the node represented by a byte array
        port - port of the node represented by a 2-byte short
